com.flatearth.desktop

Class DesktopLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flatearth.desktop.DesktopLauncher

  • public class DesktopLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class. Call javafx, which sets the settings, then starts the game. also has a terminal mode for the set up (instead of javafx)
    Author:
    mauricio
